item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer focused on Front End web development and skilled in building responsive React components, maintaining legacy code, static site generators,and accurate documentation. A quick and thorough learner and perceptive communicator, I’m always looking to learn the next interesting thing. How I got here I’ve lived in Portland, Oregon, since 2005, and in that time I’ve coached students, taught art and writing courses, and worked in customer support.
